# {{n-g|A type of [[dry stone]] wall supporting a [[terrace]] in Provence, or the terrace itself}}
types.html:
restanque f (plural restanques)

  1. A type of dry stone wall supporting a terrace in Provence, or the terrace itself
trans: A type of dry stone wall supporting a terrace in Provence, or the terrace itself
